query:
SELECT
                t.id,
                t.title,
                COALESCE(t.description, '') as "description!: String",
                CAST(COUNT(tl.id) AS INTEGER) as "tools_count!: i64"
            FROM toolkits t
            LEFT JOIN tools tl ON t.id = tl.toolkit_id
            WHERE t.user_id = ?
            GROUP BY t.id, t.title, t.description
            ORDER BY t.created_at DESC
